Html:
Hi,

I was just wondering how close to the release we are?

Thanks

Tim

Hi Tim

I'm sorry for the extended period of inactivity which has occured for several reasons I won't go into.
I'm now back actively working on the next release. There is one more reported bug to fix before this will occur so I'm hoping his should be in the next week or so.

Thanks for your continued support.

Rob

That’s no problem at all Rob, I was just wondering because it’s a great product and it would be a shame to see it fall by the wayside J
